description:
The module will examine how genome-wide datasets can be applied to questions relating to the evolutionary history of animal and plant lineages. Some of the major topics discussed will be 
(1) genome-wide datasets used to entangle rapid radiations, 
(2) genome-wide SNPs deployed to discover patterns of gene flow between neighbouring lineages, 
(3) introgression and admixture across hybrid zones, and many more.
title: Population Genomics and Phylogenomics
